thread.title: ‘Judwaa 2’ first look: Varun Dhawan brings Prem and Raja back on celluloid | Hindi Movie News - Times of India
thread.title_full: ‘Judwaa 2’ first look: Varun Dhawan brings Prem and Raja back on celluloid | Hindi Movie News - Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: ‘Judwaa 2’ first look: Varun Dhawan brings Prem and Raja back on celluloid | Hindi Movie News - Times of India
text:
Varun Dhawan is all set to recreate the magic of the 1997 superhit, 'Judwaa', starring Salman Khan, Karisma Kapoor and Rambha in the lead roles. 

The 'Main Tera Hero' actor along with his father David Dhawan and Sajid Nadiadwala are teaming up for the remake of this classic comedy, where Varun will be seen playing a double role. The actor shared the first look of the film on Twitter and captioned it,"Exclusive #Judwaa2 sept29. Raja and Prem.@taapsee @Asli_Jacqueline @NGEMovies.#firstlook.whose your pick?." 

Exclusive #Judwaa2 sept29. Raja and Prem. @taapsee @Asli_Jacqueline @NGEMovies . #firstlook .whose your pick? pic.twitter.com/pvzclXWu9N 

— VarunBadrinathdhawan (@Varun_dvn) February 7, 2017 In this refreshing first look, you can see Varun as Raja and as Prem. Jacqueline Fernandes and Tapsee Pannu will play the female leads while Salman Khan and Karisma Kapoor will make a special appearance in 'Judwaa 2'. 

With Varun's new avatar and Salman-Karisma's cameo role in the movie, there is frenzied excitement for this remake. Jacqueline opposite Varun Dhawan in ‘Judwaa 2’? 01:03
